text: Ricardo Cristóbal Blume Traverse (August 16, 1933 – October 30, 2020) was a Peruvian-Mexican actor and theatre director. He was born in Lima, Peru. He was best known for his roles in Intimidad de los parques (1965), All of Them Witches (1996) and in Fuera del cielo (2007). Blume died on 30 October 2020 at a Mexico City hospital from pneumonia caused by Parkinson's disease, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Theatre directors Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Actors from Lima
title: Ricardo Blume
